title: YARD / CUNO LOCUSTS
description:
Cuno's City of Locusts related content.
* Futile.
* I've been to shack and clicked on it.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""No. Cuno doesn't give a fuck about..."
dialogueTree.text: "No. Cuno doesn't give a fuck about bugs."

links.title: Rhetoric: "So he knows locusts are bugs."
links.text: So he knows locusts are bugs.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Oh my god." The little one seems d..."
links.text: "Oh my god." The little one seems distraught. "I told you that shit is lame!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Shut up, C!""
links.text: "Shut up, C!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Now they're gonna take you to lame..."
links.text: "Now they're gonna take you to lame-prison!"

links.title: Empathy: "She sounds like she's about to cry..."
links.text: She sounds like she's about to cry out of disappointment at Cuno's newfound lameness.

links.title: You: ""What's this about?""
links.text: "What's this about?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Deny everything, Cuno! You need to..."
links.text: "Deny everything, Cuno! You need to lawyer up!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's not gonna say anything with..."
links.text: "Cuno's not gonna say anything without his lawyer present."

links.title: Conceptualization: "*Lame...* That rings some bells......"
links.text: *Lame...* That rings some bells... Could this be connected to Night City -- a.k.a. the *City of Rage*?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Yeah, that's pretty lame. Sounds li..."
links.text: Yeah, that's pretty lame. Sounds like art.

links.title: You: ""Cuno is this about... Rage City?""
links.text: "Cuno is this about... Rage City?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Oh god, Cuno, NO!" The little one..."
links.text: "Oh god, Cuno, NO!" The little one behind the fence takes her hat off. "It's gonna happen now! They're gonna make you *lame*."

links.title: Cuno: ""Stop it, C! No one's gonna make an..."
links.text: "Stop it, C! No one's gonna make anyone lame. Cuno's got this under control."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There's definitely something going..."
links.text: There's definitely something going on here. You should check out Cuno's shack, the one with the pig's head.

links.title: You: "No, I don't want to talk to the kid..."
links.text: No, I don't want to talk to the kid about lame stuff.

links.title: Conceptualization: "But it's *not* lame! There's a real..."
links.text: But it's *not* lame! There's a real *tension* there... "City of Rage"...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There's definitely something going..."
links.text: There's definitely something going on here. Maybe he's got them stashed somewhere nearby, in some hidden place?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There's definitely something going..."
links.text: There's definitely something going on here. Remember his pigs' head shack? You should check it out.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There's definitely something going..."
links.text: There's definitely something going on here. Maybe he's got them stashed somewhere nearby, in some hidden place?

links.title: Perception (Sight): "There's a suspicious shack in the e..."
links.text: There's a suspicious shack in the eastern corner of the yard...

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's not gonna say anything with..."
links.text: "Cuno's not gonna say anything without his lawyer present."

links.title: You: ""Now hold on, no one is lame here....."
links.text: "Now hold on, no one is lame here... just tell me what happened?"

links.title: You: ""You kids are in trouble.""
links.text: "You kids are in trouble."

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Yeah," he says slowly, meeting you..."
dialogueTree.text: "Yeah," he says slowly, meeting your gaze with sullen defiance. "Cuno took the bugs. So what?"

links.title: Inland Empire: "So it wasn't the phasmid... a wave..."
links.text: So it wasn't the phasmid... a wave of disappointment washes over you.

links.title: You: ""I was really hoping it would be th..."
links.text: "I was really hoping it would be the reed-phasmid that ate the locusts. Not you, Cuno.â€œ

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, well... Cuno's all you got,..."
links.text: "Yeah, well... Cuno's all you got, bitch."

links.title: You: ""You say you don't *give a fuck abo..."
links.text: "You say you don't *give a fuck about bugs*, then you go and build a whole bug town."

links.title: Cuno: ""It's not Bug Town, it's the *City..."
links.text: "It's not Bug Town, it's the *City of Locusts*," he says, enunciating every syllable. "Locusts aren't just bug-shit. They come out of the sky like a fucking shadow. Shit *descends*."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Stoooooop!" she wails from behind..."
links.text: "Stoooooop!" she wails from behind the fence, then buries her face in her hands.

links.title: Logic: "Locusts coming down like a shadow....."
links.text: Locusts coming down like a shadow... This must be the *Night City* he mentioned when you asked him where he's been.

links.title: You: "(Point at the shack.) "So that, in..."
links.text: (Point at the shack.) "So that, in there, is Night City?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah. Locust City -- City of Rage,..."
links.text: "Yeah. Locust City -- City of Rage, City of Lights..."

links.title: You: ""So this is the city you kept talki..."
links.text: "So this is the city you kept talking about."

links.title: Cuno: ""You stop! It's like they're fuckin..."
links.text: "You stop! It's like they're fucking *night*. Locust City, Night City. City of Rage..."

links.title: Conceptualization: "There's a tug-of-war over the name..."
links.text: There's a tug-of-war over the name of his fantastical city. It's almost too big for his imagination.

links.title: Cunoesse: "The girl forces herself to watch ag..."
links.text: The girl forces herself to watch again, the corners of her eyes twitching from discomfort.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The lameness is causing her physica..."
links.text: The lameness is causing her physical pain. The damage may be permanent.

links.title: You: ""City of Rage sounds like a cool pl..."
links.text: "City of Rage sounds like a cool place."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Cuno, the pig wants to *help* you...."
links.text: "Cuno, the pig wants to *help* you..." she moans. "That's how lame it is. Please just don't say you're --"

links.title: Cuno: ""An *artist*?" He pushes his chest..."
links.text: "An *artist*?" He pushes his chest out. "Maybe I *am* an artist? You hear that everyone, I'm a fucking *artist* now."

links.title: You: ""What are you, some kind of *artist..."
links.text: "What are you, some kind of *artist* now?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Maybe I *am*," he says, looking yo..."
links.text: "Maybe I *am*," he says, looking you straight in the eye...

links.title: Rhetoric: "Did he just say *I*? Cuno usually c..."
links.text: Did he just say *I*? Cuno usually calls Cuno Cuno.

links.title: You: ""Hold on, did I hear you right? You..."
links.text: "Hold on, did I hear you right? You said 'I'."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno made Cuno. Cuno says whatever..."
links.text: "Cuno made Cuno. Cuno says whatever the fuck he wants! There are no *rules* here, pig." He steps closer...

links.title: Cuno: ""I fucking say 'I' when I wanna and..."
links.text: "I fucking say 'I' when I wanna and 'Cuno' when I wanna. Cuno's free. Cuno's free to fucking *die*, bitch."

links.title: Rhetoric: "This is what he sometimes does when..."
links.text: This is what he sometimes does when things get tense.

links.title: You: ""That's great, Cuno. It's cool to m..."
links.text: "That's great, Cuno. It's cool to make art."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""OH MY GOD, CUNO! He's gonna make y..."
links.text: "OH MY GOD, CUNO! He's gonna make you totally lame in, like, three seconds! Don't let him, Cuno!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yo, fuck you, C. Cuno can be what..."
links.text: "Yo, fuck you, C. Cuno can be what Cuno wants to be. Cuno's his own man, Cuno's *free*!" He tears at the buttons of his shirt, trying to rip them open. They don't give way.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno made himself into Cuno. Cuno..."
links.text: "Cuno made himself into Cuno. Cuno can make himself into *anything*. Cuno can make himself into a *pig* if he wants, Cuno can make himself into a f****t. Cuno doesn't give a shit."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Don't make yourself into a pig, Cu..."
links.text: "Don't make yourself into a pig, Cuno. You'll have to take me away..." A leaden silence fills the yard.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "In it, you hear snow melting, dripp..."
links.text: In it, you hear snow melting, dripping from the eaves. Someone closing a window.

links.title: Suggestion: "So that's what this is about."
links.text: So that's what this is about.

links.title: You: ""That depends on the choices *you*..."
links.text: "That depends on the choices *you* make, young girl."

links.title: Cunoesse: "Without a word she disappears entir..."
links.text: Without a word she disappears entirely behind the fence.

links.title: Cuno: "For once, the boy is lost for words..."
links.text: For once, the boy is lost for words. He's turned completely red now, with splotches of white beginning to appear across his face.

links.title: Authority: "Use this momentary confusion to tak..."
links.text: Use this momentary confusion to take *control* of the situation.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You got him. Now convince him to le..."
links.text: You got him. Now convince him to leave the cryptozoologists' traps alone.

links.title: You: ""I need you to stop taking locusts..."
links.text: "I need you to stop taking locusts from the traps. The cryptozoologists are trying to find something very important. Those locusts are bait."

links.title: Cuno: ""I don't give a shit, I don't need..."
links.text: "I don't give a shit, I don't need the locusts anyway. Shit is all lame now." He turns toward the fence. "C was right."

links.title: Cunoesse: "The girl's face appears again above..."
links.text: The girl's face appears again above the fence, just long enough to make eye contact with Cuno.

links.title: Conceptualization: "She doesn't know whether to be glad..."
links.text: She doesn't know whether to be glad because Cuno's finally convinced of the lameness... or  *more* worried, because of his continued use of the first-person singular. Cuno is Cuno. Not *I*.

links.title: You: ""I have to ask -- what does the Cit..."
links.text: "I have to ask -- what does the City of Locusts *mean*?"

links.title: Cuno: ""It don't mean anything. It's shit...."
links.text: "It don't mean anything. It's shit. Cuno just likes to focus. Cuno likes to concentrate on shit, build shit when he's zipping hard. Fuck..." He turns his face up to the heavens.

links.title: Cuno: ""Pig," he says finally, lowering hi..."
links.text: "Pig," he says finally, lowering his gaze to meet yours, "you really shouldn't have fucked with Cuno's city. Now it's all fucking lame."

links.title: You: ""What's going to happen to the locu..."
links.text: "What's going to happen to the locusts?" (Nod toward the shack.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's gonna let the fucking locus..."
links.text: "Cuno's gonna let the fucking locusts die."

links.title: You: ""Okay, now that that's settled, I'd..."
links.text: "Okay, now that that's settled, I'd better be off." (Conclude.)

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck are they trying to catch..."
links.text: "The fuck are they trying to catch anyway?" he asks before you leave. "With the traps?"

links.title: You: ""The Insulindian phasmid.""
links.text: "The Insulindian phasmid."

links.title: Cuno: ""Huh..." he mutters to himself."
links.text: "Huh..." he mutters to himself.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He recognizes the name."
links.text: He recognizes the name.

links.title: You: ""Wait, you know what the Insulindia..."
links.text: "Wait, you know what the Insulindian phasmid is?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Bitches think Cuno doesn't *know*..."
links.text: "Bitches think Cuno doesn't *know* shit..." he says angrily. "The fuck outta here, Cuno's tired of this shit."

links.title: Composure: "As you leave, you notice his usual..."
links.text: As you leave, you notice his usual rooster-like swaying posture has changed, slowed down. Like clockwork unwinding.

links.title: Empathy: "There's silence between the two chi..."
links.text: There's silence between the two children. They're not saying anything to each other nor looking in each other's direction.

links.title: You: ""Later, Cuno.""
links.text: "Later, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck outta here..." he says, n..."
links.text: "The fuck outta here..." he says, not entirely convinced of himself. "Cuno's tired of this shit."

links.title: You: ""None of your business." [Leave.]"
links.text: "None of your business." [Leave.]

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, whatever.""
links.text: "Yeah, whatever."

links.title: You: ""Oh c'mon, no one is coming to take..."
links.text: "Oh c'mon, no one is coming to take you away."

links.title: You: ""Me and Cuno have discussed this. I..."
links.text: "Me and Cuno have discussed this. I promised I won't do that."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""I don't believe you!" She disappea..."
links.text: "I don't believe you!" She disappears entirely behind the fence.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""You should listen to your friend,..."
links.text: "You should listen to your friend, Cuno. Art's lame as hell."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""ARRRRGH, CUNO! It's so lame even t..."
links.text: "ARRRRGH, CUNO! It's so lame even the *pig* knows it's lame. Please, stop!"

links.title: You: ""Whatever, kids, I just wanted to a..."
links.text: "Whatever, kids, I just wanted to ask..."

links.title: Cuno: ""You don't have a brain for this sh..."
links.text: "You don't have a brain for this shit, no one has the brain to take Cuno's shit."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""It's because of the lame, Cuno!""
links.text: "It's because of the lame, Cuno!"

links.title: Cuno: ""I am who I am, C, fuck you!""
links.text: "I am who I am, C, fuck you!"

links.title: You: ""Why steal locusts? Couldn't you fi..."
links.text: "Why steal locusts? Couldn't you find some other pets?"

links.title: Cuno: ""They're not pets." Sounds like you..."
links.text: "They're not pets." Sounds like you've offended him. "Don't you know what locusts *are*, when they come out of the fucking sky? Fuckin' *descend* and shit."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Stooooop!" she wails from behind t..."
links.text: "Stooooop!" she wails from behind the fence, then covers her face with her hands.

links.title: Cuno: ""You stop! It's like they're *night..."
links.text: "You stop! It's like they're *night*. Locusts are like this *huge shadow*..."
